title: New: Kid Trench – I'll Be Waiting
body:
Having made his debut on CitR little under a month ago, Belfast’s **Kid Trench** is back with another lovelorn ballad.

_I’ll Be Waiting_ follows in a similar vein to [Blue Skies](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/29421-new-kid-trench-blues-skies), slightly cheesy, slightly brilliant, falling somewhere in between. With little info available on his identity, these two tracks are all we have to go on for the time being.
